title: Anyway to do this?
body:
Hi, is there anyway to block or prevent certain players from responding to your posts?
I've had a few of the same accounts continuously reply to a few of my threads trolling and it's unwanted.

replies.body: Unfortunately not as far as I know, but if they're harassing you I'd call that a reportable offense. Just like we wouldn't let someone harass you in-game, it won't fly here either.
